paper_abstract: In this paper, we deal with conditional independence models closed with respect to graphoid properties. Such models come from different uncertainty measures, in particular in a probabilistic setting. We study some inferential rules and describe methods and algorithms to compute efficiently the closure of a set of conditional independence statements. (C) 2009 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Conditional independence structure and its closure: Inferential rules and algorithms
